benchmark_details.name: RoadSocial: A Diverse VideoQA Dataset and Benchmark for Road Event Understanding from Social Video Narratives
benchmark_details.overview: RoadSocial is a large-scale, diverse VideoQA dataset tailored for generic road event understanding from social media narratives, addressing existing datasets' regional and viewpoint biases.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a rich benchmark for the evaluation of Video LLMs in understanding road events through videos and social media narratives.

data.source: Social media videos from Twitter capturing road events and accompanying narratives.
data.annotation: Semi-automatic framework using Text and Video LLMs with expert verification.

methodology.calculation: Scores are derived from the semantic alignment between model-generated and ground truth answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment with ground truth answers, suggesting improved comprehension of road events.
methodology.validation: Dataset validated through human expert annotations and performance metrics across various Video LLMs.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Our data collection adheres to ethical guidelines and uses only publicly available content.
